title: Getting an error code while doing a hard reset on Pixel 4.
content:
While doing a hard reset on my Pixel 4 I'm getting an error code like this:

Formatting /Data...
Formatting /metadata...
Wiping Titan M
E:can't send spi message: Try again
E:can't send spi message: Try again
E:can't send spi message: Try again
Data wipe complete

I've never seen this before while doing a hard reset on any device until now. Does this mean something is corrupt? Is it actually wiping the data? 
Afterwards when I reboot it acts as of it has been reset, I have to go through the process of setting it up for the first time like normally done after a reset.
